message:
I think it is pretty definitive now that the JVM pretty much beat the CLR pretty badly in server side performance

http://www.techempower.com/benchmarks/#section=data-r7&hw=i7&test=json
name: TechEmpower Web Framework Performance Comparison
caption: www.techempower.com
description: Performance comparison of a wide spectrum of web application frameworks and platforms using community-contributed test implementations.

data.message: Is it "JVM is faster" or "Linux is faster"?
Actually not enough data on those web stack benchmark to see how how much better JVM runs again CLR on Windows. All the JVM stuff were run on Linux.
